SEARCH
Package com.example.hive.Controllers

Class ListController

java.lang.Object
com.example.hive.Controllers.FirebaseController
com.example.hive.Controllers.ListController
public class ListController extends FirebaseController
Controller to handle list-related operations including waiting lists, invited lists, cancelled lists, and final lists. Extends FirebaseController for database access.
Author:
Zach
